001package com.technototes.vision.hardware;
002
003import android.graphics.Bitmap;
004
005import java.util.function.IntConsumer;
006
007import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.function.Consumer;
008import org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcore.external.function.Continuation;
009
010import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvCamera;
011import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvCameraRotation;
012import org.openftc.easyopencv.OpenCvPipeline;
013import org.openftc.easyopencv.PipelineRecordingParameters;
014
015import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice;
016
017public abstract class Camera<T extends OpenCvCamera, U extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice>
018        extends HardwareDevice<U> implements OpenCvCamera {
019    protected T openCvCamera;
020
021    protected Camera(U device) {
022        super(device);
023        openCvCamera = createCamera();
024    }
025
026    protected Camera(String device) {
027        super(device);
028        openCvCamera = createCamera();
029    }
030
031    public T getOpenCvCamera() {
032        return openCvCamera;
033    }
034
035    abstract T createCamera();
036
037    @Override
038    @Deprecated
039    public int openCameraDevice() {
040        return getOpenCvCamera().openCameraDevice();
041    }
042
043    @Override
044    public void openCameraDeviceAsync(AsyncCameraOpenListener cameraOpenListener) {
045
046        getOpenCvCamera().openCameraDeviceAsync(cameraOpenListener);
047    }
048
049    public void openCameraDeviceAsync(Runnable open, IntConsumer error) {
050        getOpenCvCamera().openCameraDeviceAsync(new AsyncCameraOpenListener() {
051            @Override
052            public void onOpened() {
053                open.run();
054            }
055
056            @Override
057            public void onError(int errorCode) {
058                error.accept(errorCode);
059            }
060        });
061    }
062
063    public void openCameraDeviceAsync(Runnable open) {
064        openCameraDeviceAsync(open, i -> {});
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    public void closeCameraDevice() {
069        getOpenCvCamera().closeCameraDevice();
070    }
071
072    @Override
073    public void closeCameraDeviceAsync(AsyncCameraCloseListener cameraCloseListener) {
074        getOpenCvCamera().closeCameraDeviceAsync(cameraCloseListener);
075    }
076
077    @Override
078    public void showFpsMeterOnViewport(boolean show) {
079        getOpenCvCamera().showFpsMeterOnViewport(show);
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public void pauseViewport() {
084        getOpenCvCamera().pauseViewport();
085    }
086
087    @Override
088    public void resumeViewport() {
089        getOpenCvCamera().resumeViewport();
090    }
091
092    @Override
093    public void setViewportRenderingPolicy(ViewportRenderingPolicy policy) {
094        getOpenCvCamera().setViewportRenderingPolicy(policy);
095    }
096
097    @Override
098    public void setViewportRenderer(ViewportRenderer renderer) {
099        getOpenCvCamera().setViewportRenderer(renderer);
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public void startStreaming(int width, int height) {
104        getOpenCvCamera().startStreaming(width, height);
105    }
106
107    @Override
108    public void startStreaming(int width, int height, OpenCvCameraRotation rotation) {
109        getOpenCvCamera().startStreaming(width, height, rotation);
110    }
111
112    @Override
113    public void stopStreaming() {
114        getOpenCvCamera().stopStreaming();
115    }
116
117    @Override
118    public void setPipeline(OpenCvPipeline pipeline) {
119        getOpenCvCamera().setPipeline(pipeline);
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    public int getFrameCount() {
124        return getOpenCvCamera().getFrameCount();
125    }
126
127    @Override
128    public float getFps() {
129        return getOpenCvCamera().getFps();
130    }
131
132    @Override
133    public int getPipelineTimeMs() {
134        return getOpenCvCamera().getPipelineTimeMs();
135    }
136
137    @Override
138    public int getOverheadTimeMs() {
139        return getOpenCvCamera().getOverheadTimeMs();
140    }
141
142    @Override
143    public int getTotalFrameTimeMs() {
144        return getOpenCvCamera().getTotalFrameTimeMs();
145    }
146
147    @Override
148    public int getCurrentPipelineMaxFps() {
149        return getOpenCvCamera().getCurrentPipelineMaxFps();
150    }
151
152    @Override
153    public void startRecordingPipeline(PipelineRecordingParameters parameters) {
154        getOpenCvCamera().startRecordingPipeline(parameters);
155    }
156
157    @Override
158    public void stopRecordingPipeline() {
159        getOpenCvCamera().stopRecordingPipeline();
160    }
161
162    @Override
163    public void getFrameBitmap(Continuation<? extends Consumer<Bitmap>> continuation) {
164        getOpenCvCamera().getFrameBitmap(continuation);
165    }
166}
